road_density_km_per_100sqkm: Road density (km of road per 100 sq. km of land area)
container_port_traffic_teu: Container port traffic (TEU: 20 foot equivalent units)
energy_use_per_gdp: Energy use (kg of oil equivalent) per $1,000 GDP (constant 2017 PPP)
co2_transport_pct_total: CO2 emissions from transport (% of total fuel combustion)
lpi_infrastructure_score: Logistics Performance Index: Quality of trade and transport infrastructure (1=low to 5=high)
gross_capital_formation_pct_gdp: Gross capital formation (% of GDP) - proxy for infrastructure investment
